de.lmu.ifi.nm.www

Class NetworkPrefix

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.nm.www.NetworkPrefix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class NetworkPrefix
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class represents the combination of network address and prefix length, e.g. 10.1.0.0/24.
    Since:
    October 2, 2013
    Author:
    Dawin Schmidt, dawin.schmidt@lmu.de
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
